frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: v1.1.4 Update did-jwt
node.description:
Upgrade to latest version of did-jwt

- [save package-lock.json after install](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-credentials/commit/ab452c34f962720d64e84cf8e012927bde850748) - @mi-xu
- [bump version number to v1.1.4](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-credentials/commit/dc7324695bdfa6d5a70b572a8d8080a6b6e1397a) - @mi-xu
- [update did-jwt from 0.1.0 to 0.1.1](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-credentials/commit/98aa9b9d44e4a0ec895986d8760522abed4fb7a9) - @mi-xu

node.name: v1.1.3 Fix for CallBack
node.description:
- Callbackurl has been added as a parameter in createVerification method
- rpcUrl has been added as a parameter in createDisclosureRequest method to support private chains
- upgrade to latest version of did-jwt
